definition: to adhere/to attach oneself to/to append
to depend on/to comply with or listen to sb/according to/in the light of
to add/to attach/to be close to/to be attached

sentences.english: The distribution of the gold deposits clings to deep big faults.
sentences.chinese: 金礦牀分佈與深大斷裂存在依附性。

sentences.english: Yeats describes mankind's fleshly predicament as a soul fastened to a dying animal.
sentences.chinese: 描繪了當靈魂依附於瀕死的動物時人類肉體的窘境。

sentences.english: With the brief, simple language, the argument is continuous throughout the poem.
sentences.chinese: 議論依附於一種簡潔平白的語言，並貫穿於整首詩作。

sentences.english: And their mutual injury is the meandrous and intense reflection of their attachment consciousness.
sentences.chinese: 女性間的自相殘害是依附意識的曲折和激烈的反映。

sentences.english: Mexico cannot help but be critically dependent on its neighbor's economy.
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥只能緊緊地依附於其鄰國美國的經濟。

sentences.english: The err is dysfunctional, to forgive is co-dependant.
sentences.chinese: 犯錯是功能失調，原諒與它互相依附。

sentences.english: Personal attachment consciousness is a conspicuous form of women's tragic fate.
sentences.chinese: 人身依附意識是女性悲劇命運根源的突出表現。

sentences.english: She was a thinker in her own right, and not just an appendage of Sartre.
sentences.chinese: 她爭取自己應有權利，不依附於薩特而存在。

sentences.english: He always pins his destiny to other person.
sentences.chinese: 他常把自己的命運依附於別人身上。

sentences.english: Supports shall be attached to structural steel.
Why not unfasten it and fasten it to an immortal robot instead?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼不擺脫肉體，轉而依附不朽的機器呢？
約有25%的人是逃避型依附。

sentences.english: The borrower of the DEATH NOTE will not be followed by a god of death.
sentences.chinese: 死神不會依附借去死亡筆記的人。

sentences.english: Does your infant attachment style stay with you into adulthood?
sentences.chinese: 一個嬰兒的依附類型在成年以後是否會保持？

sentences.english: Exist hanger-on it. Everything will falling instant when the authority fall apart .
sentences.chinese: 依附的存在，一切都會伴隨着權威的倒下而瞬間崩潰。

sentences.english: Pull marketing should be utilized alongside push marketing whenever possible.
sentences.chinese: 拉式營銷應該儘可能的依附於推式營銷。

definition: to climb (of climbing plants)/to creep/to cling on to/fig. to seek connection (with the rich and powerful)/social climbing
to rely on help from sb
to rely on sb for protection
to acknowledge allegiance to (some regime)/to serve
to realign one's allegiance (to another religion, ruler etc)/to submit
to check and balance (power)/checks and balances
to vow loyalty and devotion to
to surrender and pay allegiance to
asylum/shelter/to shield/to put under protection/to take under one's wing
to rely on others for the air one breathes (idiom); to depend on sb's whim for one's living
to maintain/to keep up/to hold together
